content: clementine is a fun quick to knit classic pinafore baby dress stripes and a fun pocket insert not only make the garment so cute they also add interest during knitting its seamless construction means you knit and you are done we chose to knit clementine in hikoo s wonderful cobasi fingering yarn the yarn is a blend of cotton bamboo and stretchy nylon this yarn makes the dress light perfect for summer wear and just a little stretchy for baby s comfort these little dresses are like candy you cannot stop at just one we have prepared **clementine kits** 1 in a rainbow of colors 1 https //www thenoblethread com/product-page/clementine-kit
